User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

i disabled the image dragging layout wich provide a small preview of the image or the tab you're actually dragging : nglayout.enable_drag_images;false

because there is no need for such an heavy displaying


Actual results:

now when i'm dragging something (image or tab) i got nothing NOTHING, not a clue


Expected results:

in case of disabling the image dragging feature there should be a default icon that replaces it and moves with the cursor that says :

1 - you are actually dragging something
2 - what you re dragging is easily understandable by the icon (image or tab or ...)
